      Create the provided topic if it does not yet exist.

      Get the topic with id id if it exists.
      com.google.api.core.ApiFuture<List<Topic>> AdminClient.listTopics​(LocationPath path)
      List all topics for the specified project.
      com.google.api.core.ApiFuture<Topic> AdminClient.updateTopic​(Topic topic, com.google.protobuf.FieldMask mask)
      Update the topic with path topic.getPath() if it exists.
